alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; East Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:27AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 400 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Heberts Marina, or near Grand Lake, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport and Heberts Marina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 24 and 36. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
